definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

sentences.english: In recent years, many studies have been done in the essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 近年來關於香附的研究主要是揮發油。

sentences.english: To compare the antifebrile effects of ethanol extracts of cyperus tuber before and after microcapsulization.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察香附乙醇提取物微囊化前後的解熱效應。

sentences.english: Conclusion The extraction technology is steady and suitable for extracting total flavonoids from Cyperus Rotundus.
sentences.chinese: 結論該提取工藝穩定，適合香附總黃酮的提取。

sentences.english: The chemical components of Rhizoma Cyperi are complex, the pharmacological actions are broad.
sentences.chinese: 香附的化學成分複雜，藥理作用廣泛。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo confirm the effective part of Rhizoma Cyperi on dysmenorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定香附治療痛經的有效部位。

sentences.english: Objective:To compare the antifebrile effects of ethanol extracts of cyperus tuber before and after microcapsulization.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察香附乙醇提取物微囊化前後的解熱效應。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the extraction technology of total flavonoids from Cyperus Rotundus.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選香附總黃酮的提取工藝。

definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
bamboo shavings (Bambusa tuldoides) used in Chinese medicine
husk of betel nut 檳榔|槟榔[bing1 lang5]
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
